1_1Dj5WCaPV2r18QcDQFHmyx2HnGmwMJce9b.body: That's kind of why the Basic Income idea makes sense. Everybody is provided with a certain minimum income that will pay for shelter, and basic life requirements. Providing resources at gratis introduces the problem of people draining the resources because they are not paying. If you weren't paying for electricity, what would stop you from living all your lights and equipment on 24/7? What would stop you from living your water taps open all day long?
